title: Four Seasons Hotel Denver Announces Third Artist-in-Residence Kristen littlejohnTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Denver Announces Third Artist-in-Residence Kristen littlejohn Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Four Seasons Hotel Denver announces its third artist-in-residence for the year, fashion designer Kristen Littlejohn of Imminent Rise.”From her pop-up studio in our Hotel’s lobby, Littlejohn will design, drape and dazzle passersby with her fashion-forward women’s clothing line,” says Jolinda Cohavi, the Hotel’s Director of Marketing. “We are thrilled to support this local, up-and-coming designer.”
On October 2, 6 and 9, 2015, Littlejohn will host happy hours, open to the public from 5:30 to 7:30 pm. There, guests can interact with Littlejohn and her team while enjoying cocktails and appetisers from EDGE Bar. Earlier in the afternoon on the aforementioned dates, guests can watch the designer sketch, sew and create garments.
“We design for women on the rise,” says Littlejohn. “Imminent Rise is a brand for an upcoming generation of women that do not hold themselves to social molds. We believe in feminine strength and therein lies our passion for how we design the line.”
Made in the USA, Imminent Rise set out to build a brand around easy to understand and easy to wear garments. Littlejohn’s journey began with her signature Orion Tank, a silk basic that is effortlessly comfortable and chic. As the company grows, the brand continues to build on high-end essential apparel with a fashion forward mindset.
In 2015, Four Seasons Hotel Denver hosted its first artist-in-residence in January, contemporary Western artist Duke Beardsley. In June, the Hotel welcomed fashion photographer Jody Zorn, who conducted photo shoots during happy hours in EDGE Bar, as well as an underwater video shoot.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotel
